description: Danuu Covers extend the life of your craft by protecting it from the elements and harmful UV rays! Our covers are made with a standard of quality that is higher than anyone else and are shown repeatedly to be the best in their class.<br><br>Our covers are durable and convenient, simply drape it over your craft and cinch the straps for a custom fit. Perfect storage solution for those without the ability to keep their boat inside a garage or shed - also provides unsurpassed protection while traveling.
name: Skipper - Canoe Cover
